title: How can we seperate acetaldehyde from acetophenone? - Quora

response.answer_text: The quantitative method to seperate acetaldehyde and acetophenone The boiling point of Acetaldehyde - 20.2 degree C. Acetophenone- 202 degree C. so you can do simple distillation to separate it from acetophenone. Or anyway Acetaldehyde will evaporate if you keep the mixture in the fume hood for some time. The qualitative method of separation/ identification: You can do Tollen’s test to distinguish Acetaldehyde and Acetophenone. Acetaldehyde will give the silver mirror in the test and Acetophenone will not.
